org.bookshare.net
Class BookshareWebservice

java.lang.Object
  org.bookshare.net.BookshareWebservice

public final class BookshareWebservice
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the services needed for getting data from Bookshare's Webservice API.

getResponseStream

public java.io.InputStream getResponseStream(java.lang.String wsPassword,
                                             java.lang.String requestUri)
                                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                             java.io.IOException
Retrieves the InputStream in response to a requested URI. Method also takes care of user authentication. This InputStream needs to be used in appropriate way to handle the response depending on the response. E.g. If the requested URI is for downloading a file, read data from this InputStream and write to a local file using OutputStream. E.g. If the requested URI returns a XML or JSON response, make use of corresponding parsers to handle the data.

Parameters:
wsPassword - password of the Bookshare's web service account.
requestUri - The request URI.
Returns:
InputStream representing the response.
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException
java.io.IOException

getHttpResponse

HttpResponse A HttpResponse object.
